sentences.sContent: The tornado disrupted broadcasting along the entire coast.
sentences.sCn: 龙卷风使整个沿海的广播都中断了。

sentences.sContent: The tornado is coming, so we had better batten down the hatches here and get to the cellar.
sentences.sCn: 龙卷风即将来临，因此我们最好把这里的舱口封上，到地下室去。

synos.tran: [气象]龙卷风；旋风；暴风；大雷雨

remMethod.val: torn(转动) + ado → 能转动万物的风 → 飓风， 龙卷风

trans.tranOther: an extremely violent storm consisting of air that spins very quickly and causes a lot of damage
